description: Horoscope prediction templates for AstroAI - Compatible with Horoscope.js database model

favorable: Today brings excellent opportunities for professional advancement. Your hard work will be recognized by superiors. {planet} in {house} supports your ambitions.
A productive day at work awaits you. Your communication skills will shine, making it an ideal time for presentations or negotiations.
Professional collaborations will flourish today. Consider networking and building new connections in your field.
Your creative solutions will impress colleagues. Take initiative on projects that showcase your expertise.
Leadership opportunities may present themselves. Trust your instincts and take calculated risks.
moderate: A steady day for career matters. Focus on completing pending tasks rather than starting new projects.
Patience is key today. Some delays in work projects are possible, but they'll resolve by week's end.
Routine work will keep you occupied. Use this time to organize and plan for upcoming initiatives.
Maintain professionalism in all interactions. Minor workplace tensions may arise but can be managed diplomatically.
challenging: Exercise caution in professional decisions today. Avoid conflicts with authority figures.
Not an ideal day for major career moves. Focus on damage control and maintaining current positions.
Workplace politics may surface. Stay neutral and avoid getting involved in disputes.
Stress levels may be high. Delegate tasks where possible and don't overcommit yourself.

favorable: Financial gains are indicated today. A pending payment may arrive or an investment could show positive returns.
Good day for financial planning. {planet} supports wise money decisions and long-term investments.
Unexpected monetary benefits possible through networking or professional contacts.
Your financial wisdom will be appreciated. Consider helping family members with money matters.
Favorable for signing contracts or finalizing deals. Read fine print carefully before committing.
moderate: Maintain balanced spending today. Avoid impulse purchases but don't be overly restrictive either.
Financial status remains stable. Good time to review budgets and track expenses.
Small unexpected expenses may arise. Keep emergency funds accessible.
Neither significant gains nor losses expected. Focus on maintaining financial discipline.
challenging: Exercise financial caution today. Postpone major purchases or investments.
Avoid lending money or making financial commitments. Risk of losses if not careful.
Hidden expenses may surface. Review all bills and statements for errors.
Not favorable for speculation or gambling. Stick to conservative financial approach.

favorable: Harmonious day for relationships. Express your feelings openly and spend quality time with loved ones.
Romance is highlighted. Single individuals may encounter interesting prospects through social activities.
Family bonds strengthen today. Plan a special meal or outing with relatives.
Your understanding nature will resolve any lingering conflicts. Communication flows smoothly.
Ideal day for important conversations about commitment or future plans with partner.
moderate: Relationships remain stable. Minor misunderstandings possible but easily resolved through dialogue.
Busy schedule may limit quality time with loved ones. Make conscious effort to connect.
Balance personal needs with partner's expectations. Compromise leads to harmony.
Social obligations may demand attention. Manage time between work and personal life.
challenging: Potential for disagreements with loved ones. Practice patience and avoid harsh words.
Misunderstandings may arise from poor communication. Think before speaking.
Not ideal for important relationship decisions. Postpone serious discussions if possible.
Past issues may resurface. Address them calmly rather than defensively.

favorable: High energy levels today. Excellent time to start a new fitness routine or healthy habit.
Your immunity is strong. Maintain current wellness practices for continued vitality.
Mental clarity and physical stamina are well-balanced. Good day for yoga or meditation.
Digestive system functions optimally. Experiment with nutritious new recipes.
Sleep quality improves. Establish a relaxing bedtime routine for long-term benefits.
moderate: Average health day. Maintain regular diet and exercise without overdoing either.
Minor fatigue possible. Ensure adequate rest and hydration throughout the day.
Stress may affect well-being. Practice deep breathing or short relaxation breaks.
Watch dietary intake. Avoid heavy or spicy foods that may cause discomfort.
challenging: Low energy levels indicated. Prioritize rest and avoid strenuous activities.
Stress or anxiety may affect health. Consider stress-management techniques.
Minor ailments like headaches or digestive issues possible. Stay hydrated and rest.
Avoid neglecting health signals. Consult healthcare provider if symptoms persist.

week1.favorable: The month begins with professional momentum. New projects or responsibilities may be assigned. {planet} in {house} enhances your leadership capabilities.
week1.moderate: First week requires diligent effort on existing commitments. Avoid taking on additional workload until current tasks are completed.
week1.challenging: Initial week may present workplace challenges. Maintain professionalism and seek guidance from experienced colleagues when needed.

week2.favorable: Second week brings recognition for your efforts. Superiors notice your dedication. Good time for salary discussions or position upgrades.
week2.moderate: Mid-month requires balanced approach. Some projects advance while others may stall temporarily.
week2.challenging: Workplace stress peaks in week two. Delegate tasks and avoid confrontations with colleagues.

week3.favorable: Third week excellent for networking and professional relationships. Collaborations flourish and new opportunities emerge through contacts.
week3.moderate: Week three maintains steady pace. Focus on quality over quantity in deliverables.
week3.challenging: Late month challenges arise from miscommunication. Clarify expectations with team members and supervisors.

week4.favorable: Month concludes on positive note. Completed projects receive appreciation. Plan for next month's goals strategically.
week4.moderate: Final week for wrapping up monthly objectives. Some tasks may carry over to next month.
week4.challenging: Month-end pressure mounts. Prioritize urgent matters and request deadline extensions if necessary.

overview.favorable: Financially rewarding month ahead. Income sources expand and savings accumulate. {planet} supports material prosperity throughout this period.
overview.moderate: Month maintains financial stability with moderate income and controlled expenses. Neither significant gains nor major setbacks expected.
overview.challenging: Exercise financial restraint this month. Unexpected expenses likely. Avoid major purchases and risky investments.

investment.favorable: Excellent month for long-term investments. Property, stocks, or retirement funds show promise. Consult financial advisor for optimal strategies.
investment.moderate: Modest investment opportunities available. Research thoroughly before committing funds.
investment.challenging: Not favorable for new investments. Focus on protecting existing assets and maintaining liquidity.

romantic.favorable: Romance blossoms this month. Couples experience renewed passion and understanding. Singles may meet significant prospects at social gatherings or through friends.
romantic.moderate: Relationships require conscious effort. Plan quality time despite busy schedules. Communication prevents minor conflicts from escalating.
romantic.challenging: Relationship tests possible this month. Old patterns resurface requiring honest dialogue and mutual compromise for resolution.

family.favorable: Family harmony prevails. Celebrations or gatherings bring joy. Support from relatives strengthens during important decisions.
family.moderate: Family dynamics remain generally peaceful with occasional differences of opinion requiring diplomatic handling.
family.challenging: Family tensions may arise from misunderstandings or conflicting priorities. Practice patience and avoid reactive responses.

physical.favorable: Robust health throughout the month. Energy levels support both work and exercise. Ideal time to establish sustainable fitness routines.
physical.moderate: Health remains stable with minor fluctuations. Maintain preventive care and avoid neglecting symptoms.
physical.challenging: Vulnerable period for health. Stress management crucial. Watch diet, ensure adequate sleep, and avoid overexertion.

mental.favorable: Mental clarity and emotional balance characterize this month. Meditation or mindfulness practices yield excellent results.
mental.moderate: Mental health adequate but requires conscious maintenance. Balance work stress with relaxation activities.
mental.challenging: Stress or anxiety may affect well-being. Professional counseling or support groups beneficial if needed.

Q1.career: First quarter establishes yearly professional trajectory. {planet} in {house} influences career direction significantly.
Q1.finance: Financial planning crucial in Q1. Budget carefully for year ahead.
Q1.relationship: Relationships require attention and nurturing. Set relationship goals early.
Q1.health: Focus on preventive health measures. Establish exercise and diet routines.

Q2.career: Professional opportunities multiply in Q2. Network actively and showcase skills.
Q2.finance: Income potential increases. Consider diversifying revenue streams.
Q2.relationship: Social life expands. New connections enrich personal life.
Q2.health: Maintain consistency in health routines established in Q1.

Q3.career: Mid-year review of professional progress. Adjust strategies as needed.
Q3.finance: Financial gains from earlier investments materialize. Review portfolio.
Q3.relationship: Relationships deepen. Important commitments or celebrations possible.
Q3.health: Monitor stress levels. Summer activities support overall wellness.

Q4.career: Year concludes with recognition for annual achievements. Plan next year's objectives.
Q4.finance: Year-end bonuses or unexpected income likely. Tax planning important.
Q4.relationship: Family gatherings and celebrations bring joy. Reflect on relationship growth.
Q4.health: Energy may dip towards year-end. Prioritize rest and rejuvenation.

career.early_career: Foundation years focus on skill development and gaining experience. Multiple job changes expected as you discover your true calling.
career.mid_career: Professional peak period with leadership roles and financial success. {planet} indicates strong potential in {field} sector.
career.late_career: Transition towards mentoring or consulting. Accumulated wisdom becomes valuable asset.
career.retirement: Post-retirement engagement in social causes or passion projects brings fulfillment.

finance.accumulation: Wealth building occurs gradually through consistent effort. {planet} in {house} indicates primary income sources from {source}.
finance.peak_prosperity: Financial peak between ages {age_range}. Property investments particularly favorable.
finance.legacy: Estate planning important for transferring wealth to next generation smoothly.

relationship.marriage: Marriage indicated around age {age}. Partner likely to be {characteristics}. Compatibility strongest with {signs}.
relationship.family: Children bring joy and responsibility. {number} children indicated. Family life generally harmonious with normal challenges.
relationship.later_years: Companionship and mutual support characterize later relationship years. Grandchildren bring renewed purpose.

health.constitution: Overall constitution is {type}. Vulnerable areas include {body_parts}. Preventive care crucial.
health.major_periods: Health challenges possible around ages {ages}. Regular checkups and healthy lifestyle mitigate risks.
health.longevity: Potential for long life with proper health management. {planet} influences vitality significantly.

excellent.description: Highly favorable period. Maximum opportunities and minimal challenges.

good.description: Favorable period with good prospects. Some minor challenges manageable.

moderate.description: Balanced period. Equal mix of opportunities and challenges requiring effort.

challenging.description: Difficult period requiring caution and patience. Focus on damage control.

very_challenging.description: Highly challenging period. Minimize risks, postpone important decisions.
